column5: Hi everyone,I decided to lock the "unfair non-resident treatment post"The issue had been beaten to death, and the post was taking away from the load time of the board.What "locked" means is that you can still read all the replies and the message, but no one can add a new reply.If anyone has a problem with this please let me know.Pikeman - Admin
I guess I wont win the pool at work. I had 200 reply's as the over/under

As a Canadian and it being Canada Day very soon, I would like to say I found it to be an interesting topic and an insite into some of the opinions about our country. The subject has been flogged to death on a fishing forum and it was a good idea to lock it. Just one quick question does anyone know of a good fly for pickerel?
Should have been done a long time ago, thanks anyway.
PikemanThanks for all of your work on this site . walleyecentral is a great site and it must take alot of effort to keep it that way. Your efforts are appreciated by many.

Hi there,I would love to take crdit for this site, however Scott Golden is the Creator and designer/maintainer of the site. I just help out, making sure the board runs smoothley etc.Just thoght credit should go where credit is due! :-)Pikeman
Sounds like typical American censorship to me...

Are you saying that i locked the post because i am American? Well since i am from Canada, that's not the case. My Dad is American so i have duel citizenships, so that is pretty egual. I love both countries.Pikeman
